title: ATV / Off-Roading
short_description: Drive powerful quad bikes through sand dunes, mud tracks, and forests.
long_description:
ATV (All-Terrain Vehicle) Quad Biking is a high-power off-road activity that puts you in the driver's seat of a 4-wheeled beast. Designed to tackle rough landscapes like sand dunes, muddy trails, and rocky hills, these machines are easy to handle (usually automatic gears) but powerful enough to give you a serious thrill.

India offers diverse terrains for quad biking. In Jaisalmer and Nubra Valley, you can bash towering sand dunes. In Goa and Manali, tracks often involve forest trails and river crossings. It’s a raw, dusty, and loud experience that appeals to petrolheads and adventure lovers alike.

locations.summary: Dune bashing on golden sands at sunset.
Riding on the silver sand dunes of Hunder with Himalayan views.
River crossing and rocky trail rides.
Jungle trails and spice plantation tracks.

opening_hours.time_notes: Jaisalmer rides often continue till 7 PM for sunset.

operating_season.off_season: Monsoon (muddy tracks can be dangerous or fun depending on location).

pricing_metadata.disclaimer: Rates in Jaisalmer/Manali are highly negotiable.

safety_guidelines: Follow the guide's track; do not veer off into unknown terrain (risk of tipping).
Keep feet inside the footrests at all times.
Maintain safe distance from the bike in front.
Do not attempt wheelies or drifts unless expert.
major_experiences: Remote views accessible only by off-road vehicles
Sunset photo op on the dunes

sample_itinerary.one_day: Arrive at Sam Sand Dunes by 4:00 PM. Rent ATV. 20-minute dune bashing session. Sunset photography. Camel ride back to camp.

booking_methods: On-site at Sam Dunes / Solang Valley
booking_details.how_to_reach: Sam Dunes is 40km from Jaisalmer city. Solang is 14km from Manali.

seo.seo_description: Go off-roading in Jaisalmer dunes or Goa's jungles. Quad biking prices start at ₹800. Find best ATV tracks in India.

highlights: No driving license usually required for closed tracks/dunes.
Easy to learn - automatic gears (thumb throttle).
Nubra Valley offers the unique double-humped camel + ATV combo.
Great group activity for racing friends.
Jaisalmer offers the best open-desert drifting experience.
Accessible year-round in places like Goa and Lonavala.
